origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinancialComplianceAPI.fetch_regulations', 'description': 'This function retrieves regulatory articles related to financial loan compliance.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'topic', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The specific topic of the regulations, e.g., financial_loan_compliance.'}, {'name': 'articleCount', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The number of articles to retrieve.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'articles', 'description': 'A list of regulatory articles related to the specified topic.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinancialComplianceAPI.fetch_regulations, 它的参数输入如下: 'topic'是'financial_loan_compliance', 'articleCount'是'5'.
